awd_titl_txt: REU:  Summer Research Experience in Computer Science
awd_abstract_narration: The "Summer Research Experience in Computer Science" will involve               ten students in an intensive eight week research project.  Three                principal investigators will supervise, direct and counsel these                students.  Care will be taken to insure that minorities and women               make up at least 50% of the research team and at least eight are                non-South Alabama students.  The major focus of the projects will               be theoretical and applied utilization of supercomputers in the                 general field of computer science.  Dr. Larry Basenspiler has had               prior experience directing an NSF/REU project and will be the                   project administrator.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering

pgm_ref.pgm_ref_txt: REU SITE-Res Exp for Ugrd Site
